{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Samsung |model=SCH-LC11 |revision=(Verizon) |upc= |ean= |asin=B008DFZLOY;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/07/2010 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id=A3LSCHLC11 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=MDM9600 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=4G,3G |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Verizon SCH-LC11 XXXX Secure |default_ssid_regex=^Verizon SCH-LC11 [a-f0-9]{4} Secure$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=94:63:D1 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.tnet.com/home/files/samsung-sch-lc114g.pdf Manual]
The Flash chip used may be a '''STMicroelectronics''' NAND02GR3B2CZA6.
To reset the device to factory defaults, remove the battery cover and hold the Reset/WPS key on the left side of the device for 10 seconds until all LEDs turn white.
